tool_description: Calculates the change in monetary value of a purchased cryptocurrency based on its purchase price, it's initial price and final price.
name: Cryptocurrency Calculator
title: Cryptocurrency Calculator

api_list.name: Value Change
api_list.description: This will return the unit amount of the cryptocurrency that was purchased, it's change in value, the amount that it changed by, and the percentage difference.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/value/1000/45000/55000"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/value/{purchase}/{initial}/{final}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
